name: Impunity
description:
A lightweight, hectic clicker game.

Instructions:

Your goal is to complete a project before you 'Joy' runs outs. The Joy bar at the top will deplete over time, and when cancelling projects (by clicking the red x). Joy is filled when you do some dev work on a project. 

  • Controls:
    Mouse - interact, click buttons and drag panels about
    Esc - pause

This is a bit of a personal project for me, as it describes a state I find myself in consistently. I struggle with larger projects, eventually ending up hating them and abandoning them. I have also struggled with Game Jams in the past, my entry for GMTK Jam 2020 was broken and unfinished. So I set a goal to make a super small game, and try to complete it - not desperately hammer it in at 1-minute to deadline - and as I write this, there are 3h 27m to deadline. I'm very happy about that. I spent more time than usual polishing, and although I didn't really get very far with the audio I'm pleased over all.

Thanks so much for playing my game, and I hope you can take something away from it.
